mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant(name, bizr_no, address, region_cd, tel_no, intr_dc, min_order_price, payment_type, owner_id, category_id, open_time, close_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{bizrNo}, #{address}, #{regionCd}, #{telNo}, #{intrDc}, #{minOrderPrice}, #{paymentType}, #{ownerId}, #{categoryId}, #{openTime}, #{closeTime})
